scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.start: npx tsc && npm run copy && npx parcel src/videoFilterDemo/index.html
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp node_modules/mirada/dist/src/opencv.js static/* dist/
scripts.build-demo: npx parcel build src/videoFilterDemo/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-source-maps --public-url './' && cp node_modules/mirada/dist/src/opencv.js static/* docs && rm -rf ../../../demos/docs/ojos-demo && mkdir -p ../../../demos/docs/ojos-demo && mv docs/* ../../../demos/docs/ojos-demo/ && rm -rf docs
scripts.build: npm run clean  && npm run lint && npx tsc && npm run copy && npm run build-demo && npm run build-anim-demo
scripts.build-anim-demo: rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && npx parcel build -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-source-maps --public-url './' probes/anim.html && rm -rf ../../../demos/docs/ojos-demo/anim* && cp docs/* ../../../demos/docs/ojos-demo && rm -rf docs
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
